welcome.title: Welcome to LifeSheet
welcome.subtitle: Your CV management and tailoring solution
welcome.manageYourJourney.description: LifeSheet helps you organize, update, and tailor your CV for different job applications, ensuring you always put your best foot forward.
welcome.storeAndOrganize.description: Keep all your professional experience, education, and skills in one place. Never lose track of your achievements.
welcome.tailorAndCustomize.description: Adjust your CV for specific job applications. Highlight relevant experience and skills for each opportunity.
welcome.exportAndShare.description: Generate professional-looking CVs in multiple formats and share them directly with potential employers.
welcome.readyToLevelUp: Ready to level up your job applications?
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your CVs, subscriptions, and more
dashboard.exportMyCV.description: Export your full, untailored CV as a PDF file.
dashboard.editCVData.description: Edit your Personal Information, Work Experience, Education, Skills, or add a Profile Photo.
dashboard.cvTailoring.description: Tailor a CV to a job, based on the job description and requirements.
dashboard.tailoredCVs.description: View and manage your tailored CVs.
dashboard.mySubscription.description: View or change your current subscription.
